Contributor: Fouqueray, Charles, 1869-1956, artist.; Lapina Imp, printer.;
Note: Signed "Charles Fouqueray." Visa No. 12400" appears on the bottom left of the illustration. Orientation: Vertical.
Description: Text in French tells of a memorial event for the daughters of soldiers and officers who died or became invalids. The officers are to be honoured for their patriotic services. Illustration shows three women laying a wreath at the memorial.
Digital Collection: Allied Posters of World War I
Local Rights Statement: This material is made available for private study, scholarship, and research use. For access to the original or a high resolution reproduction, contact: Temple University Libraries, Special Collections Research Center, scrc@temple.edu, 215-204-8257.

Title: Institution royale de messines
